attributes.action: Boris Johnson must resign. His failure  has killed  citizens in this epidemic.
attributes.additional_details: UK has almost the worst death rate and performance in tackling Covid-19 in the world. No amount of bluster, lying and arm waving can hide that fact.
attributes.background: Vote for a motion of no confidence in  Johnson and his immediate advisors.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or the Government to be sacked or resign, or for a vote of no confidence.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314151
